mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_num AS "orderNum", a.vend_id AS "vendOffice.id", a.total_detail AS "totalDetail", a.total_exp AS "totalExp", a.freight AS "freight", a.inv_status AS "invStatus", a.biz_status AS "bizStatus", a.plateform_id AS "plateformInfo.id", a.status AS "delFlag", a.initial_pay AS "initialPay", a.last_pay_date AS "lastPayDate", a.remark AS "remark", a.delivery_office_id AS "deliveryOffice.id", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.current_payment_id AS "currentPaymentId", a.pay_total AS "payTotal", so.name AS "vendOffice.name", payment.id AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.id", payment.po_header_id AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.poHeaderId", payment.total AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.total", payment.pay_total AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.payTotal", payment.biz_status AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.bizStatus", payment.deadline AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.deadline", process.id AS "commonProcess.id", process.object_id AS "commonProcess.objectId", process.object_name AS "commonProcess.objectName", process.prev_id AS "commonProcess.prevId", process.biz_status AS "commonProcess.bizStatus", process.processor AS "commonProcess.processor", process.description AS "commonProcess.description", process.type AS "commonProcess.type", process.create_time AS "commonProcess.createTime", prevProcess.id AS "prevCommonProcess.id", prevProcess.object_id AS "prevCommonProcess.objectId", prevProcess.object_name AS "prevCommonProcess.objectName", prevProcess.prev_id AS "prevCommonProcess.prevId", prevProcess.biz_status AS "prevCommonProcess.bizStatus", prevProcess.processor AS "prevCommonProcess.processor", prevProcess.description AS "prevCommonProcess.description", prevProcess.type AS "prevCommonProcess.type", prevProcess.create_time AS "prevCommonProcess.createTime"

b.id AS "id", b.order_num AS "orderNum", b.vend_id AS "vendOffice.id", b.total_detail AS "totalDetail", b.total_exp AS "totalExp", b.freight AS "freight", b.inv_status AS "invStatus", b.biz_status AS "bizStatus", b.plateform_id AS "plateformInfo.id", b. STATUS AS "delFlag", b.initial_pay AS "initialPay", b.last_pay_date AS "lastPayDate", b.remark AS "remark", b.delivery_office_id AS "deliveryOffice.id", b.create_id AS "createBy.id", b.create_time AS "createDate", b.u_version AS "uVersion", b.update_id AS "updateBy.id", b.update_time AS "updateDate", b.current_payment_id AS "currentPaymentId", vend. NAME AS "vendOffice.name", ppo.id AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.id", ppo.po_header_id AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.poHeaderId", ppo.total AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.total", ppo.pay_total AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.payTotal", ppo.process_id AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.processId", cp.id AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.commonProcess.id", cp.object_id AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.commonProcess.objectId", cp.object_name AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.commonProcess.objectName", cp.prev_id AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.commonProcess.prevId", cp.biz_status AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.commonProcess.bizStatus", cp.processor AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.commonProcess.processor", cp.description AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.commonProcess.description", cp.type AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.commonProcess.type", cp.create_time AS "bizPoPaymentOrder.commonProcess.createTime", b.is_prew as "isPrewUseful"

LEFT JOIN sys_office so on so.id=a.vend_id LEFT JOIN biz_po_payment_order payment on payment.id = a.current_payment_id LEFT JOIN common_process process on process.id = a.process_id LEFT JOIN common_process prevProcess on prevProcess.id = process.prev_id

LEFT JOIN sys_office vend ON vend.id = b.vend_id LEFT JOIN biz_po_payment_order ppo ON ppo.id = b.current_payment_id LEFT JOIN common_process cp ON cp.id = ppo.process_id LEFT JOIN biz_po_order_req bpor ON bpor.po_id = b.id AND bpor.so_type = 2 LEFT JOIN biz_request_header rh ON rh.id = bpor.so_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO biz_po_header( id,
order_num,
vend_id,
total_detail,
total_exp,
freight,
inv_status,
biz_status,
initial_pay,
last_pay_date,
remark,
delivery_office_id,
plateform_id, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time, is_prew ) VALUES ( #{id},
#{orderNum},
#{vendOffice.id},
#{totalDetail},
#{totalExp},
#{freight},
#{invStatus},
#{bizStatus},
#{initialPay},
#{lastPayDate},
#{remark},
#{deliveryOffice.id},
#{plateformInfo.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{isPrew} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE biz_po_header SET
order_num = #{orderNum},
vend_id = #{vendOffice.id},
total_detail = #{totalDetail},
total_exp = #{totalExp},
freight = #{freight},
inv_status = #{invStatus},
biz_status = #{bizStatus},
initial_pay = #{initialPay},
last_pay_date = #{lastPayDate},
remark = #{remark},
delivery_office_id = #{deliveryOffice.id},
plateform_id = #{plateformInfo.id},
u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate}, is_prew = #{isPrew} WHERE id = #{id}
